posts.post_title: FS/FT or B/O - Ed Hahn - Slight (but clear) Ghost Image
posts.post_content:
Looking to see if anyone was interested in this slight, but distinct Ghost Image of Ed Hahn... I darkened the top scan so you can clearly see his "other" face over the original... pretty cool card.

If you're interested send a cash offer or may trade for other T206's, PM or e-mail me
thanks
